Magical Kernel C.R.A.P PWN Writeups

papichulo16 (Luis Abraham)

This picture is ironic

I am a part time Vulnerability Researcher while studying Computer Science at Florida Institute of Technology, estimated to graduate in Fall 2027.

I really like low-level and bare-metal programming and computing. I started off with binary exploitation on CTF competitions and now I do other cool projects while also working. Here are some of the things I do:

  • PWN (binex) and RE (rev eng)
  • Embedded and Baseband VR
  • VR on Low Level Network Stacks
  • Emulation
  • OS dev
  • Other cool things
